newsArray.title: `This will rank right at the top`: KL Rahul on Team India`s win at The Oval
creator: Mid-day
newsArray.description: “For us as a team, that wasn’t given a chance in this series. And for us to fight back and to fight in every game and to get a result which is 2-2 might seem like a drop. But for us and for Indian Test cricket going in the future, I think this will rank right at the top,” he added
